component.name: GroundInterface
component.comment: Validates inbound/outbound FSW packets and routes them to the correct endpoint. For uplinked packets, they are received/validated synchronously and immediately queued on to the CommandDispatcher message queue to be processed. Downlink items on the otherhand are buffered internally to pack multiple downlink objects in to fewer packets. This requires downlink handlers be guarded to ensure thread safety of the buffer. This component only checks packets at the FSW packet header level, all UDP framing needs to occur outside of this component.

port.name: tlmDownlink
port.comment: TlmChannel sends GroundInterface telemetry items to downlink. The GroundInterface component will serialize the data in to application level blocks which is sent to UDP sender to be fragmented by MTU and transport.

port.name: logDownlink
port.comment: ComLogger sends GroundInterface log items to downlink. The GroundInterface component will serialize the data in to application level blocks which is sent to UDP sender for framing, MTU fragmentation, and transport.

port.name: appDownlink
port.comment: Other application components request a buffer to hand off a downlinked packet to be downlinked. 0: Camera 1: UWB

port.name: cmdUplink
port.comment: GroundInterface validates and forwards deserialized a uplinked command to CmdDispatcher. 0: Lander Serial (WatchDog RS422) 1: WF121 (NetworkManager)

port.name: cmdDispatch
port.comment: GroundInterface forwards a validated uplinked command to CmdDispatcher. Commands are buffered by the CommandDispatcher's message queue.

port.name: downlinkBufferSend
port.comment: GroundInterface sends buffer of data to be downlinked to UDP sender for framing, MTU fragmentation, and transport. 0: Lander Serial (WatchDog RS422) 1: WF121 (NetworkManager)

channel.name: GI_UplinkSeqNum
channel.comment: Increment the uplink sequence number every packet

channel.name: GI_DownlinkSeqNum
channel.comment: Update the downlink sequence number every packet

channel.name: GI_PacketsReceived
channel.comment: Number of packets received from link to F'

channel.name: GI_PacketsTransmitted
channel.comment: Number of packets transmitted from F' to link

channel.name: GI_TlmItemsReceived
channel.comment: Number of telemetry items received and queued

channel.name: GI_LogsReceived
channel.comment: Number of logs received and queued

channel.name: GI_CmdsSent
channel.comment: Commands sent to Command Dispatcher queue.

channel.name: GI_UplinkPktErrs
channel.comment: Number of uplinked packets with errors

channel.name: GI_AppBytesReceived
channel.comment: Number of bytes from packets from components not TlmChan, ComLogger received

channel.name: GI_AppBytesDownlinked
channel.comment: Number of bytes from packets from components not TlmChan, ComLogger downlinked

event.name: GI_UplinkedPacketError
event.comment: Error validating uplinked packet. Expected field is only logged for MISMATCHED_LENGTH and OUT_OF_SEQUENCE. For INCORRECT_TYPE, the magic value s a U32 so the upper short is stored in expected and lower short is stored in got.

event.name: GI_CommandReceived
event.comment: A command packet was received. One command per packet (and datagram) is strictly enforced

event.name: GI_DownlinkedPacket
event.comment: A packet sent to UDP receiver for downlink

event.name: GI_DownlinkedItem
event.comment: An item was added to the packet for downlink

item.name: WATCHDOG
item.comment: Watchdog wired interface (RS422). Matches WatchdogInterface component attached to port 0.

item.name: WF121
item.comment: WF121 wireless interface (WiFi). Matches NetworkManager component attached to port 1.

command.comment: Sets the telemetry level of this component
